metadata.name: Stinger
metadata.description:
Edition 1/3 (+ 1 AP)

Stinger draws upon video-game alchemy and the activating properties of nature and botanics, sculpting flowers in VR before animating them in Blender to grant them an otherworldly and spellbinding sense of movement. As a reference to dance and performance, the animations were developed as a choreography, with each flower portrayed as a body plunging through space, reaching, creeping, and lunging towards each other. 

Original audio by Ben Dixon.
